original_text: These are all the rules that a person must use. They are for when he gives a gift to God. They are the rules for offerings of grain and the friendship offering. And they are rules for the offerings that people give to take away their sin. The rules tell them how to make Aaron's sons priests. And they tell people who have done bad things what to do. They must show God that they are sorry.
korean_text: 이는 번제와 소제와 속죄제와 속건제와 위임식과 화목제의 규례라

sentences.original_text: These are all the rules that a person must use.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들은 사람이 사용해야 하는 모든 규칙들입니다.

sentences.original_text: They are for when he gives a gift to God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 하나님께 선물을 드릴 때 사용됩니다.

sentences.original_text: They are the rules for offerings of grain.
And they are rules for the friendship offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 화목 헌물을 위한 규칙입니다.

sentences.original_text: And they are rules for the offerings that people give to take away their sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 사람들이 죄를 없애기 위해 드리는 헌물을 위한 규칙입니다.

sentences.original_text: The rules tell them how to make Aaron's sons priests.
sentences.korean_translation: 규칙들은 그들에게 아론의 아들들을 제사장으로 만드는 방법을 알려줍니다.

sentences.original_text: And they tell people who have done bad things what to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나쁜 일을 한 사람들에게 무엇을 해야 하는지 알려줍니다.

sentences.original_text: They must show God that they are sorry.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 미안함을 하나님께 보여야 합니다.
